K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-1: dag gi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-2: de las gzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-3: sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-4: de dag kyang phyi rol gyi gos dur smrig tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-5: khong pa'i nang gi 'dun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-7: shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi mthun la gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-8: skyon sgrog par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-9: yon tan nges par sbed par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-12: dregs pas non cing ngar 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-13: nga yir 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-14: de dag shi 'phos na'ang ngan song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-15: tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-18: yid du mi mchi ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang mthong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-20: de'i slad du sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:443a-21: ngan 'gro'i lam las rnam par bzlog nas bsod nams kyis gzhal med khang thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-0: de skad ces gsol @464b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-3: de ltar khyod sengge'i sgra bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-4: de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-6: sems can rnams gang thob nas legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-7: nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag khyod zhus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-8: zhus nas kyang the tshom med par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-12: lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-14: mi rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-16: sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-20: yi dvags rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-22: rigs mthon po rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:464b-25: bran mo rnams su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-0: mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams skal pa @465a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-1: bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-3: kha dog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-5: gnod pa ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-6: lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-7: skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-9: sems can rnams mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-11: kha dri mi bda' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-14: lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-15: nyes byas kyi las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-18: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byang ba dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-20: rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du rgyun du sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-22: dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du don yang grub par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465a-24: bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-0: 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad @465b la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-1: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-3: chos thams cad la lkog tu ma gyur pa'i spyan dang ldan pas rnam par phye ste rgyas par lan stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-5: spobs pa'i blo gros; khyod kyis ji lta bu'i zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam par phye ste bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-7: tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-8: de bzhin du 'tshal lo; ;zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-11: sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-14: dang po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar byed cing bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-15: gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par mi byed cing bkren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-16: gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-17: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:465b-18: gso sbyong la brtson zhing bden par smra ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-1: bzhin du 'dug cing rang gi skyon tshad med pa spong bar byed la myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-2: las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lus thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-4: srog chags gsod las ldog pa byas pas lha dang mi dang lha min rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-5: 'jig rten du ni mi thub lus can tshe ring med 'gyur ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-6: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shis ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-7: lha nang rab mchog de yi longs spyod sna tshogs dpal can rtag tu 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-8: por ma thag tu lha nang rtag tu lha yi dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-9: bsam med bsal ba 'phro ba rnam log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-10: rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-11: rtse zhing dga' ba'i dpag bsam shing gi yul na me tog gtor lus ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-12: mkhas shing 'dod pa mi phan yongs spangs dri mchog dag pa'i lus dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-13: tshe rabs kun tu dpe med gser mchog lus dang ldan zhing rab tu mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466a-14: rtag tu lha yi nang du skal pa bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-0: lha mo sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal @466b la spyod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-1: sngon chad cho ga bzhin du ngag skyon bzhi spangs kha ni dri zhim ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-2: gsal zhing thogs med mi 'jigs tshig mchog lha rnams 'dir ni nges par 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-3: yang dag lan 'debs rnams bsgrags snyan cing skye bos shin tu tshig gzung 'os //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-4: pi wam rol mo sgra 'byor sprin sgra skad snyan pho brang 'khor skad ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-5: ma rmongs sems kyis myos 'gyur ma legs rjod byed spangs pas lhar 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-6: grangs med dge ba'i lha yis mchod pa lha yi gnas na gnas par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-7: blo dang ldan zhing lus brtan yid bzang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-8: de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa rjod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-9: gal te tshe zad lha yi yul nas lhung ba'i lha rnams de tshe smad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-10: sdig med lo brgya nyi shu 'gro na lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-11: bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus 'od cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-12: lha rnams lam sel byed cing lha rnams bye bas mchod de brtan par 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-15: sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:466b-17: dang po byas pa gzo bas sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-1: bsngal ba la kun bged pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-2: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ma nyams par bsten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-3: sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-4: brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos la spro bar byed cing nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang bcas la mthun par 'dzin pa ste; spobs pa'i blo gros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-5: sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur zhing longs spyod kyang chen por 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-8: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-9: 'jig rten gyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to; ;sbyin pa byin pas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-11: rtag tu longs spyod 'byor dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-12: lus ngan po dang mtshungs par sbyin dang sbyod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-13: rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-14: tshul khrims ma nyams de ni dkon mchog mchod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-15: nyes byas yongs su spangs pas shin tu nges pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-16: tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467a-17: bde ba thob pas skyon med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-0: nges pa'i mi ni pha rol sems 'khrugs ma @467b byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-1: gzhan dag rnams kyis gnod byas phyir ni gnod mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-2: de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang gshe bar mi byed pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-3: dge ba mchog gi tshul thob nas ni mdzes par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-4: brtson 'grus bzang la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-5: stobs dang gzi brjid chen po dge ba rnams dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-6: dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pa thob par gyur pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-7: longs spyod 'byor pa'i spyod yul ldan pas lha der 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-8: mi 'phrog sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu mthun pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-9: byas pa gzo zhing las la 'dod par rab tu byad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-10: dkon mchog gsum dang ma la sogs la mchod mdzangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-11: nam yang kun la the tshom byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-12: mi gang khyad par 'phags pa dge ba lnga po rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-13: byed pa de ni sa yi bdag por rab tu 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-14: stobs la sogs dang gzugs dang longs spyod mi zad ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-15: grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rnams kyis rim gro byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-18: sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:467b-19: sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas kyang de dag tu bskal pa bye ba mang por gnas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-1: dkon mchog la dad par mi byed la kun tu bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas skur pa 'debs par byed cing 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-3: bar gyi dus na'ang dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-6: dge bsnyen ma gang zag bzhi po mang por mi gus pa mthun par mi 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-7: 'jig rten gyi smra ba lhur len pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-9: gcig la gcig nyes rtsom gyis gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gis rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-13: bu rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun pas mi gus pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-14: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la brten nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste bdag nyid dge slong yin par khas 'che shing dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa la mi gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-0: slob dpon rnams mgu bar mi byed cing bka' blo mi bde la mthun par mi 'dzin cing yang dag par rjes su bstan kyang rjes su bstan pa la sgrub par mi byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed @468b la; bdag la bstod pa byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-1: gzhan la smod par byed cing nga rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-3: dregs pa'i shas che la bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-4: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing skur pa 'debs par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-6: sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-7: sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing skye nas kyang ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig pa ma byung ba de srid du gnas par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-8: 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-9: gang gi tshe der yang 'jig pa byung bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-10: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-12: kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'khyams shing sdug bsngal nyams su myong la 'byung ba'i mtha' med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to; ;rmongs pas thog ma med nas 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal bying gyur pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:468b-14: 'jig rten sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho khas len mi byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-0: de ni kun rig ma yin rnal @469a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-2: bdag nyid chud gzan skye bo gzhan rnams la yang slu bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-3: bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'byor pa sdug pa'i mchog byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-4: de ni dge ba chung 'gyur 'jig par byed pa'i char 'gyur zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-5: mi dge 'di ni mngon sum dge ba mdun na yod bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-6: 'on kyang sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-7: bar ma rtsod pa'i dus 'dir bzhi po bkres pas nyam thag pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-8: phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin pas dkrugs shing bla ma smod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-9: 'khor du 'dus pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di ni rnam bshig pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-10: mi bzad ro med log par ltung ba'i sar ni 'gro bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-11: rgyal po pha dang sring mo spun dang gzhon nu bu mo rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-12: byams pa'i yid ni log gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:469a-13: byis pa bu ltar thams cad gcig la gcig ni bzhad gad byed; ;log ltung dam pa rnam par 'bying bar myur du 'gro bar 'gyur //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-6: lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-8: sems yid rnams kyis gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-9: log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnams sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-10: lus kyis sdug bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-11: lcags kyi lcags kyu chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-12: gshin rje'i dbang phyug gnas su'ang mi rnams shin tu zangs bskol ldud par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-13: dmyal bar mi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-14: gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar kha dri mi zhim zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-15: 'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta na sdug pa ma yin rnams su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-16: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan skur 'debs rtsod pa'i skyon mang zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-17: de dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi ni sa ya mang pos gleng bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:474b-18: sems can rdzun smra rnams kyis tha mal sems dang lus bde ma yin phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-1: 'gro de yi 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-2: mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun la slu byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-3: sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-4: 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-5: de ltar lus can 'khyams pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-10: rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-11: gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-13: dge 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-15: ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475a-18: bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas gzhan dag kyang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-0: rnam pa @475b thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-1: mkhan po dang slob dpon shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-2: bka' blo bde ba dang mthun par 'dzin par sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-3: kun tu thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-4: ji ltar brtsams pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-8: bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis bar chad med par sgom pa la mngon par zhen cing sgrub par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-12: rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-13: gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-15: dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi bral bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:475b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-0: ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par @476a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-3: gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi chos la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-4: de dag nyid kyis sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-5: sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzugs legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-6: mkhas pa rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-7: gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten ma lus la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-8: bdag dang bu gcig byis pa rnams dang 'drar mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-9: de dag sreg pa kun tu mya ngan med nges 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-10: shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-11: gang dag shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad rnams; ;nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun tu spyod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-12: 'dir ni rmad du byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-13: 'jig rten mun pa che la snang la mchog byed 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-14: kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-15: sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni gzhan med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-16: nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476a-17: mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-0: de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas @476b rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-2: yid bde ba skyes nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-3: so so'i g-yog 'khor lnga brgya tsam po de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-4: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-14: mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis ni; ci bsam pa bzhin gyi theg pa rnams la sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-15: ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa'ang thob cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-20: rgyan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-21: de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:476b-22: bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i bla mas chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-0: chos lnga po de dag thos nas 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams @477a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-1: cad rdzogs par don grub par gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-2: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thob nas nag po'i phyogs spangs te dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-3: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par spyan 'dren na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-4: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang ba mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-6: de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-7: dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g-yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-8: de rang gi khyim du song nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag byas te thal mo sbug sbug por sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-10: 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon mchog gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477a-13: khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-0: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi @477b dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-1: des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-3: de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yid dga' ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-6: khyod kyis lags par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-9: de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis rang gi chung ma padma g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-11: khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du bza' ba dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-13: sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-16: dar gyi lda ldi gdags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-17: me tog chal par dgram pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-18: bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug par byed du bcug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa'i gdan ci 'os su bting ste mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan sngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces bsgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:477b-20: spobs pa'i blo gros mdza' bshes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-1: rgan rabs la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'grogs shing ji skad smras pa thams cad byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal skyed mos tshal chen po nas byung nas sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas cho 'phrul dang bcas pas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por gshegs so; ;gshegs nas kyang rim gyis spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim ga la ba de logs su bzhud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-3: de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsus nas mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-5: ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'os pa la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-7: de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478a-13: yid dga' zhing 'dud la bla ma la gus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-0: @478b gces par byed pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa la 'brim par rtsom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-3: spos chur bcas pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-4: yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par gyur nas de gnyis las gcig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-5: dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-6: de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang btung ba 'byor tshogs zhes ma smras la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-8: de gang gis kyang ci'ang ma byin nas de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci'ang ma byin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-9: dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-10: sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing snying rje med la byams pa'i sems ldan pa ma yin pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-11: gang de dag la byin yang 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-13: gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-14: thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los gcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-15: snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-16: de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:478b-17: bca' ba dag 'byor tshogs zhes byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su @479a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-1: thugs rangs par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-4: bza' ba dang btung ba mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-5: bsod pa thob nas de yid rangs te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang dag gis bza' ba dang btung ba mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-7: dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-8: snying brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing byams pa'i bdag nyid can dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-10: bdag zhag bdun du tshim par 'gyur bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-11: gang 'di dag la byin na 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-12: sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-14: gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na; sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis rim gro byed par gyur cig snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas gsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-17: deng phyin chad bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479a-18: btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du rjes su yi rang brjod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-0: de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g-yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar @479b 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-2: yang dag par gzangs bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-3: yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa sngon du mdzad pa'i chos kyi gtam sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed pa mdzad do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-4: gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas de na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-5: de nas sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor 'khyams 'khyams te yul gzhan zhig tu song nas pha zad tshu zad tsam gyi phyogs su nyal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-6: der bsod nams kyi las can de la steng gi nam mkha' la grib ma'i don du sprin gyi bla bre glog dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-7: de'i tshe yul de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-8: de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'ang gzhan med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-17: ltas mkhan dang skar ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:479b-18: gza' spyod pa la mkhas pa la rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brtson par gyur cing 'dri'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-0: skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig @480a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-3: de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rgyal po la 'os pa rin thang che ba'i khri stan bzang po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-4: yu ba nor bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-5: yu ba gser las byas shing nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga ma'i bsil yab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-6: spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-11: thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-13: slo ma dag thogs te sol snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-15: glu dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-16: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas byung ste kun nas de kun tu btsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-17: ltas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bkab pa'i phyogs de mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-18: mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-20: khyed cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dga' zhing gsal ba'i phyogs de mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-24: des smras pa; de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480a-25: de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don du sprin de dag 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-0: de nas de dag der dong nas @480b sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-1: glu dbyangs kyi sgras spran te btud nas de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-2: dbang bskur ba bzhes la rgyal por gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-4: kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-6: bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad mi zer bar gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-9: de nas de dag gis mal gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de stan bzang po la 'dug tu bcug nas bkra shis thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing dbang bskur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-10: dbu rgyan dar thod can la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas shing rta'i mgo logs su gdugs chen po bsgrengs te btsugs shing yu ba gser las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsil yab dag gis g-yob cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-12: rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas mngon par bstod de rgyal po pho brang 'khor du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-13: de nas rgyal po'i shing rta de sgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa gcig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-14: de nas bsod nams kyi las can de'ang rgyal srid la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:480b-15: de'i rgyal srid de'ang yams kyi nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-0: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar @481a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-1: gyur to; ;rgyal po'i ming gis yon tan thams cad 'byor cing ldan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-2: dga' mgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du 'di gang gi mthu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-3: bdag gi rgyal srid skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa 'di gang gis byung bar gyur snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-4: de sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi las mngon par 'du byas pa de thams cad rjes su dran no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-5: yang dag par dran nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshur gshegs su gsol zhes pho nya zhig btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-6: pho nya btang nas kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-7: rang gi khyim gyi bar du bar der bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas te me tog chal bar bkram nas gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-10: rta babs btsugs shing po phor dag gis bdugs nas mngon par brgyan te bcom ldan 'das kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-11: de nas rgyal po de grong khyer gyi mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-12: yul mi dang bcas shing blon po chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481a-15: 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas bsu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @481b kyi zhabs la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-4: phye mas bsgos pa'i slo ma dpag tu med pas mchod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-5: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la lus thams cad kyis phyag btsal nas 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-6: gces par byed pa chen po mchog gis bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rang gi khyim gyi nang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyed mos tshal chen pos yongs su bskor bar gshegs su gsol nas zhag bdun du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-7: de nas rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas gsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir g-yog 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-12: bdag gi rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa 'di ga las mchis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:481b-15: mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na sbyin bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-0: des dus gzhan zhig na rang gi khyim du sangs @482a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-1: rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-2: de nas der sdug bsngal ba gnyis shig lhags zhes bya ba nas rgyas par snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-3: gcig gi mgo khyed kyis shing rta'i 'khor los chod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-4: de'ang shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal bar skyes te; der skyes pa de'i mgo skad cig skad cig la skyes so cog na lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar bas bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-5: de'ang de nas bskal pa bye bas thar par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-8: bdag de lta bur gyur nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du gdugs tshod gsol bar gyur cig ces khyod kyis smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-9: khyod kyi bsam pa de'ang rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-11: tshe rabs dpag tu med pa thams cad du phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to; ;'jig rten nag po 'byung ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-13: yid ni dug gi rtsa ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-14: nyes par smra rnams 'byung ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482a-15: kha ni sdig pa'i sgo nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-0: sems kyis @482b sna tshogs sems par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-1: de nas tshig tu smra bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-2: ngag yid dag gis sdig byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-3: lus kyis sdug bsngal sbyin par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-4: phan dang mi phan ma bsam par; ;blo gros med pas sdig byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-5: des na sdug bsngal snod 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-6: nyon mongs pa dag de ltar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-7: mkhas pa rnams kyi mgo bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-8: yid kyis gcod par 'dod pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-9: blo gros ngan pa mi shes pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-10: mgo ni 'khor los yang dag gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-11: dpal ldan yid 'di kho nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-12: chos dkar bdud rtsi sten pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-13: sems can bsod nams byas dge rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-14: lha yi 'jig rten rnams su khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-15: 'dir ni snying gis kun bsdam nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-16: tshig tu brjod pas legs smras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-17: de phyir de ni lus kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-18: bsod nams mdzod ni len par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-19: mi yis blo ni sngon btang ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-20: las dge mi dge rnams phye nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-21: gal te bsod nams che byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-22: rtag tu rab tu lha der 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-23: sems kyis mi dge ba yi las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-24: rtag tu yongs su spangs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-25: rab tu dga' bas bsod nams nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-26: mi yis bya ste sdig pa min; ;tshe rabs bye ba grangs med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-28: lha mi'i nang du rgyal po'i dpal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:482b-29: thams cad thob nas khyod bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-0: @483a *// mi yi dbang phyug dus kun tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-1: srid rnams snying po med shes nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-2: khyod kyis sangs rgyas chos rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-3: mngon par brtson pa mtha' yas bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po des yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas mchog tu yid byung ste 'khor dang bcas pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-5: gzhan stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-7: chos mnyan pas lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-8: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der gang sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa de thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te gtsug lag khang gi skyabs shin tu dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-11: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483a-14: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-1: rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa las ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i theg pa rnams la lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-7: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-8: las rnam par 'byed pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-9: tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-13: tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-14: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:483b-18: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:484a-1: gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:484a-2: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-057-009:484a-3: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bendha ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
